results.title: Let's Go Sailing
results.brief_description: Australia 11’s coaching consultant and the 1984 Australian Olympic sailing coach, Mike Fletcher, introduces us to boatcraft and the elements of sailing. He presents the full range of basic knowledge necessary to enable us to take a sail boat onto the water.

results.title: Let's go riding
results.creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
results.brief_description: The progress story of a father and daughter whose visit to a riding school decides them to take up riding. As a result of further training at a pony club and a riding club they reach a sufficient standard to consider specialising in dressage, show jumping and cross country. The film also contains examples of top grade riding at national and international events.

results.title: Let's go gliding
results.brief_description: For centuries mankind has admired the soaring eagle and the effortless flight of the gull. While some aeronautical engineers perfect jumbo-jets and space probes, others continue to improve gliders for the sport of soaring. There is no cheaper form of flying. The fuel is solar energy, the motive forces are the thermal air currents triggered by the sun’s rays. Call it sport, or just plain enjoyment, it is an emulation of the bird. This is a celebration of soaring from the viewpoint of real people who are involved in the sport. Narrated by Ian Roache.

results.title: Let's get Skase
results.creator_credit: Film Finance Corporation Australia, Lotteries Commission of Western Australia, Media World Features, ScreenWest, Colin South, John Tatoulis and Matthew George
results.brief_description: A quirky adventure-comedy based on the alleged “true story” of one man’s attempt to kidnap failed Australian businessman Christopher Skase. When Peter Dellasandro (Lachy Hulme) convinces the creditors of the Quintex Empire to fund a covert mission to send a crack team of experts to Majorca to kidnap Skase and return him to Australia things don’t go quite as he planned. What his crack team of misfits lack in skill, they make up for in enthusiasm. Cast includes Craig McLachlan, who stars as Eric Carney, host of a reality TV program who is mounting his own mission to ‘get Skase’, and Alex Dimitriades as Danny D’Amato, Dellasandro’s right-hand man.

results.title: Let's draw with crayons
results.brief_description: Elementary school children demonstrate several methods of using crayons artistically. Various techniques of application, shading, blending and using crayons are illustrated. Methods of creating designs for arts and crafts, textiles and posters are included. Good and bad drawing techniques are compared and hints made on the care of crayons.
results.description: Elementary school children demonstrate several methods of using crayons artistically. Various techniques of application, shading, blending and using crayons are illustrated. results.title: Let's discuss smoking
results.creator_credit: Walford Hewitson, ONF | NFB and Roger Blais
results.brief_description: Designed for teenage audiences, this film should add point and persuasion to any discussion of tobacco addiction. No aspect of cigarette smoking is left unaired as a group of students question a professor of psychology. What to do with parents who smoke is one question. Displays the timeless attitude held by teenagers of not being worried about the effect smoking is going to have on them in fifty years time - old age is such a long way off! An even-tempered investigation not without humor.

results.title: Let's discuss it
results.creator_credit: Roger Blais, ONF | NFB and David Bennett
results.brief_description: To encourage more people to express themselves at meetings of their neighborhood groups, this film shows a Home and School Association whose members tend to keep their ideas to themselves until after the meeting. When a study group is formed to overcome this problem it learns the do’s and dont’s of stimulating discussion, and examines the role of the leader in fostering discussion among members and in maintaining focus on the goals of the group.

results.title: Let's Dance the Light Fantastic
results.brief_description: Professional dance team, David Rooney and Jo Shinta, demonstrate step by step the Bridal Waltz and new vogue dances - Swing Waltz, Gipsy Tap, Pride of Erin and Barn Dance.
